name: science exhibition
details:
📢 Smart India Hackathon (SIH) Internal Hackathon 2025 – Registration Open! 🚀

We are thrilled to announce that registrations for the SIH Internal Hackathon 2025 are now open! 🎉

📅 Internal Hackathon Date: 9th September 2025
⏳ Last Date to Register: 7th September 2025 (till 4:00 PM)

👥 Team Guidelines:
1. Each team must have 6 members.
2. At least 1 female member is mandatory in every team.
3. Choose a unique team name representing your group.

📌 Submission Instructions:
1. Only the Team Leader needs to fill the form.
2. PPT must be prepared only on the given template.
PPT Template: https://www.sih.gov.in/letters/SIH2025-IDEA-Presentation-Format.pptx
3. Maximum 6 slides allowed in the PPT.

📝 Registration Form Link:
👉 https://forms.gle/a8e4nQxV4riwpRqf7

For any queries, feel free to contact:
📞 Gavesh Jain – 7742908700
📞 Yuvraj Pratap Singh  – 7398226246
📞 Pratul Agarwal – 7768291852

Let’s come together, innovate, and make SIH 2025 a grand success! 💡
